    S

    S - Enum constant in enum class application.model.tetromino.TetrominoType
    S-piece (green): S/skew in a 3×3 bounding box (SRS standard).
    SceneManager - Class in application.view
    Manages view switching within a single Scene.
    SceneManager(Stage, int, int) - Constructor for class application.view.SceneManager
    Creates a new scene manager and attaches a scene to the given stage.
    SCORE_PER_LINES - Static variable in class application.util.Config
    Score awarded per line cleared.
    setBgmVolume(double) - Method in class application.util.SoundManager
    Sets the BGM volume, clamped to the range 0.0–1.0.
    setBossAnimCallback(Runnable) - Method in class application.controller.GameController
    Sets the callback for boss sprite animation updates.
    setCellState(int, int, boolean, String) - Method in class application.model.board.Board
    Sets a specific cell's state.
    setColorName(String) - Method in class application.model.board.Cell
    Sets the color name of this cell.
    setOccupied(boolean) - Method in class application.model.board.Cell
    Sets whether this cell is occupied.

    Sets the callback invoked when the game ends.

    Sets the callback invoked when the ESC key is pressed.

    setRenderCallback(Runnable) - Method in class application.controller.GameController
    Sets the render callback invoked each game-loop tick.
    setSfxVolume(double) - Method in class application.util.SoundManager
    Sets the SFX volume, clamped to the range 0.0–1.0.
    SettingsOverlay - Class in application.view
    Semi-transparent pause overlay displayed when ESC is pressed.

    Constructs the settings overlay with volume sliders and action buttons.
    setTrash(boolean) - Method in class application.model.board.Cell
    Sets whether this cell is a trash block.
    setView(Parent) - Method in class application.view.SceneManager
    Replaces the entire view content, clearing any overlays.
    ShuffleBoardAction - Class in application.model.action
    A boss attack that randomly shuffles the occupied blocks in the top half of the board, disrupting the player's carefully built structures.
    ShuffleBoardAction() - Constructor for class application.model.action.ShuffleBoardAction
    Creates a new ShuffleBoardAction with a default random instance.
    shutdown() - Method in class application.util.SoundManager
    Stops all sounds and clears caches.
    SidePanel - Class in application.view
    Displays Hold piece and Next piece previews.
    SidePanel() - Constructor for class application.view.SidePanel
    Constructs the side panel with hold and next piece preview canvases.
    SingleTrashLineAction - Class in application.model.action
    A boss attack that inserts one trash line at the bottom of the Tetris board.
    SingleTrashLineAction() - Constructor for class application.model.action.SingleTrashLineAction
     
    SKELETON - Enum constant in enum class application.model.boss.BossType
     
    SkeletonBoss - Class in application.model.boss
    A medium-difficulty boss (stages 3–5).
    SkeletonBoss(int) - Constructor for class application.model.boss.SkeletonBoss
    Creates a SkeletonBoss with the given max health.
    SLIME - Enum constant in enum class application.model.boss.BossType
     
    SlimeBoss - Class in application.model.boss
    The easiest boss in the game (stages 1–2).
    SlimeBoss(int) - Constructor for class application.model.boss.SlimeBoss
    Creates a SlimeBoss with the given max health.
    SoundManager - Class in application.util
    Centralized sound and music manager for the game.
    start(Stage) - Method in class application.Main
    Initializes the primary stage, loads fonts, and shows the main menu.
    startGame() - Method in class application.controller.GameController
    Initializes the model and starts all four game threads.
    stopBgm() - Method in class application.util.SoundManager
    Stops the currently playing background music.
    stopGame() - Method in class application.controller.GameController
    Stops all game threads by setting the master flag and interrupting each thread.
